original_text: And the Spirit of the Lord will come upon thee, and thou shalt prophesy with them, and shalt be turned into another man.
korean_text: 네게는 여호와의 영이 크게 임하리니 너도 그들과 함께 예언을 하고 변하여 새 사람이 되리라

sentences.original_text: And the Spirit of the Lord will come upon thee
and thou shalt prophesy with them
and shalt be turned into another man
